participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and hardworking, Emily is passionate about her goals and loves horses.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for a generations. i want to be a lawyer. i'm from a small town.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, George enjoys the outdoors and has a unique lifestyle as a bee farmer.
participant_2.background: i'm a bee farmer. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i am close to.

content.text: Hey! Are you from a small town? Because I am.
